title: Isaac Sim: Photorealistic Simulation and Synthetic Data
description: NVIDIA Isaac Sim is a powerful and scalable robotics simulation application built on the NVIDIA Omniverse platform. It is a critical component in the development of AI-powered robots, offering a highly realistic virtual environment for design, testing, and training without the constraints and costs associated with physical hardware.
